original_title: Detention orders on suspected gunman in ex-Homagama PS member’s murder
original_body_lines: Police have obtained detention orders to question the gunman allegedly involved in the shooting and killing of former Homagama Pradeshiya Sabha member Shantha Mudunkotuwa.
The Pugoda Magistrate’s Court has issued a seven-day detention order to interrogate the suspect, after the suspect was produced before the court today (21).
